RJ, I did not ask spirit for evidence, they have nothing to prove to me,  
=
because it is as i said before, this is subject to the listener for the mos=
t  
part.  They are real people over there just like here, and for this typ=
e of 
 communication to be coming out now was a part of God's plan.  Except=
 it  
not.  The Wright Brother's were laughed at too, people thought flying=
 was  
nuts!  Yet here we are today flying all over the place, lol everythi=
ng  
material in existence today was once first in the realm of spirit or a=
  thought 
like state, I believe Jung called the prototypes  of everything,=
  Archtypes,  
Some might think of the Archtype for the person a guardian  =
angel of each 
spirit.sf

tern Daylight Time,

 this first experiment.

For those who say  skeptical people won't listen t=

great way to provide  some publicly and prove or=
 disprove that statement.

And if your're just  the type who maintains an o=
pen mind, and would like to 
try to see what works  and what doesn't, here'=

l you have to do is ask your  boxes/spirits/aliens/etc, what it is.

fter, the test.

nt. Partial answers 
(like just the color, or  shape, or some emotion vibe)=
 don't count. Just 
tell me what it is.

 to be a regularly occurring experiment,  
and I hope we all can learn from=
 the results.
